channel.title: Armageddon By Rainaka and Saint
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/474/banneryl.png[/img][/center] [size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Introduction[/font][/size]
Hello, and welcome to the Armageddon Project Thread! This is going to be a 317 based off of Toxicity 3;(Emulous) and Galkon's Refactored. A webclient will be available for play and so will a downloadable version! No domain has been purchased yet, but as soon as one is, it will be posted. The jobs of both of us are as follows,
Saint - Main Server Programmer, Website Programmer, Graphic Artist. Rainaka Main Client Programmer and Overall Programmer.
[size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Details[/font][/size]
The all around theme of this isn't 100% followed up on, but for now we're just adding what we feel is necessary.
[size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Features[/font][/size]
* Windows XP, Vista, and 7 Capabilities * Webclient and Downloadble Client * 508 Gameframe * HD Orb Cursors * Full Combat, Both PVP and PVN * Duel Arena, 100% * HD Textures, including moving water * New Login Screen * Increased Stability * Thieving, (90-95%) * Capable of handing new models, interfaces, sprites, animations, etcetera. * Magic and Ancient Interfaces with black boxes * Emote Interface with character sprites * Friends and Ignore Interfaces, newer * JFrame, that is very efficient * HD Tzhaar Maps * More to come!
[size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Media[/font][/size] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/14ybz47.png[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/28i42f4.png[/img] Npc following/retreat + Text HP Bar that is color sensitive to your HP [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/1q4il1.png[/img] Headicons [URL=http://i29.tinypic.com/aob2n7.png]When you load client you get this splash[/URL] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/15ceesh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2ijrv3r.png[/img] [URL=http://img.techpowerup.org/100802/Capture199.png]Client Loadup Screen[/URL] [URL=http://img.techpowerup.org/100802/Capture206.png]CUSTOM OPTIONS MENU[/URL] [IMG]http://img.techpowerup.org/100802/Capture207.png[/img]
[size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Credits[/font][/size]
[ul][li] * Rainaka * Saint * Galkon - Client and answered many questions * K4rn4ge - Epic tutorials and helped * Klepto - Launcher * Tivo7 - Bought domain * voiD - Help [/li] [li][/li][/ul]

item.title: Armageddon By Rainaka and Saint
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Sainnnnt:

* Windows XP, Vista, and 7 Capabilities

??

What is the point in that; the people who use Linux, Mac, Solaris and other operating systems are left out…

Read full topic

item.title: Armageddon By Rainaka and Saint
item.dc:creator: @Sainnnnt Sainnnnt
item.description:
@Sainnnnt wrote:

[center][/center]
[size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Introduction[/font][/size]

Hello, and welcome to the Armageddon Project Thread! This is going to be a 317 based off of Toxicity 3;(Emulous) and Galkon’s Refactored. A webclient will be available for play and so will a downloadable version! No domain has been purchased yet, but as soon as one is, it will be posted. The jobs of both of us are as follows,

Saint - Main Server Programmer, Website Programmer, Graphic Artist.
Rainaka Main Client Programmer and Overall Programmer.

[size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Details[/font][/size]

The all around theme of this isn’t 100% followed up on, but for now we’re just adding what we feel is necessary.

[size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Features[/font][/size]

* Windows XP, Vista, and 7 Capabilities
* Webclient and Downloadble Client
* 508 Gameframe
* HD Orb Cursors
* Full Combat, Both PVP and PVN
* Duel Arena, 100%
* HD Textures, including moving water
* New Login Screen
* Increased Stability
* Thieving, (90-95%)
* Capable of handing new models, interfaces, sprites, animations, etcetera.
* Magic and Ancient Interfaces with black boxes
* Emote Interface with character sprites
* Friends and Ignore Interfaces, newer
* JFrame, that is very efficient
* HD Tzhaar Maps
* More to come!

[size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Media[/font][/size]


Npc following/retreat + Text HP Bar that is color sensitive to your HP

Headicons
When you load client you get this splash


Client Loadup Screen
CUSTOM OPTIONS MENU

[size=18pt][font=times new roman]The Credits[/font][/size]

[ul][li] * Rainaka
* Saint
* Galkon - Client and answered many questions
* K4rn4ge - Epic tutorials and helped
* Klepto - Launcher
* Tivo7 - Bought domain
* voiD - Help
[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]
